newsitem.title: USA: ICG unit sold 17,491 access lines in qtr.
newsitem.headline: ICG unit sold 17,491 access lines in qtr.

text.p: ICG Communications Inc said its CLEC subsidiary, ICG Telecom Group, sold 17,491 local access lines during the quarter ended March 31.
Of the total number of access lines reported, 5,371 were in service as of March 31, the company said.
Officials from the company were not immediately available to comment further.

ICG also said it began marketing and selling competitive local dial tone services in three of its primary markets: California, launched in late January, followed by Ohio in February and Colorado in March.
